verses.verse: Then Yosef <WH3130> could <WH3201> <WH8804> not refrain <WH662> <WH8692> himself before all them that stood <WH5324> <WH8737> by him; and he cried <WH7121> <WH8799>, Cause <WH3318> every man <WH376> to go out <WH3318> <WH8685> from me. And there stood <WH5975> <WH8804> no man <WH376> with him, while Yosef <WH3130> made himself known <WH3045> <WH8692> unto his brethren <WH251>.
And he wept <WH6963> <WH1065> aloud <WH5414> <WH8799>: and the Egyptians <WH4714> and the house <WH1004> of Pharaoh <WH6547> heard <WH8085> <WH8799> <WH8085> <WH8799>.

And Yosef <WH3130> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto his brethren <WH251>, I am Yosef <WH3130>; doth my father <WH1> yet live <WH2416>? And his brethren <WH251> could <WH3201> <WH8804> not answer <WH6030> <WH8800> him; for they were troubled <WH926> <WH8738> at his presence <WH6440>.

And Yosef <WH3130> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto his brethren <WH251>, Come near <WH5066> <WH8798> to me, I pray you. And they came near <WH5066> <WH8799>. And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, I am Yosef <WH3130> your brother <WH251>, whom ye sold <WH4376> <WH8804> into Egypt <WH4714>.

Now therefore be not grieved <WH6087> <WH8735>, nor angry <WH2734> <WH8799> with yourselves <WH5869>, that ye sold <WH4376> <WH8804> me hither: for 'Elohim <WH430> did send <WH7971> <WH8804> me before you <WH6440> to preserve life <WH4241>.

For these two years <WH8141> hath the famine <WH7458> been in <WH7130> the land <WH776>: and yet there are five <WH2568> years <WH8141>, in the which there shall neither <WH369> be earing <WH2758> nor harvest <WH7105>.

And 'Elohim <WH430> sent <WH7971> <WH8799> me before you <WH6440> to preserve <WH7760> <WH8800> you a posterity <WH7611> in the earth <WH776>, and to save your lives <WH2421> <WH8687> by a great <WH1419> deliverance <WH6413>.

So now it was not you that sent <WH7971> <WH8804> me hither, but 'Elohim <WH430>: and he hath made <WH7760> <WH8799> me a father <WH1> to Pharaoh <WH6547>, and lord <WH113> of all his house <WH1004>, and a ruler <WH4910> <WH8802> throughout all the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.

Haste <WH4116> <WH8761> ye, and go up <WH5927> <WH8798> to my father <WH1>, and say <WH559> <WH8804> unto him, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> thy son <WH1121> Yosef <WH3130>, 'Elohim <WH430> hath made <WH7760> <WH8804> me lord <WH113> of all Egypt <WH4714>: come down <WH3381> <WH8798> unto me, tarry <WH5975> <WH8799> not:

And thou shalt dwell <WH3427> <WH8804> in the land <WH776> of Goshen <WH1657>, and thou shalt be near <WH7138> unto me, thou, and thy children <WH1121>, and thy children's <WH1121> children <WH1121>, and thy flocks <WH6629>, and thy herds <WH1241>, and all that thou hast:

And there will I nourish <WH3557> <WH8773> thee; for yet there are five <WH2568> years <WH8141> of famine <WH7458>; lest thou, and thy household <WH1004>, and all that thou hast, come to poverty <WH3423> <WH8735>.
And, behold, your eyes <WH5869> see <WH7200> <WH8802>, and the eyes <WH5869> of my brother <WH251> Binyamin <WH1144>, that it is my mouth <WH6310> that speaketh <WH1696> <WH8764> unto you.

And ye shall tell <WH5046> <WH8689> my father <WH1> of all my glory <WH3519> in Egypt <WH4714>, and of all that ye have seen <WH7200> <WH8804>; and ye shall haste <WH4116> <WH8765> and bring down <WH3381> <WH8689> my father <WH1> hither.
And he fell <WH5307> <WH8799> upon his brother <WH251> Binyamin's <WH1144> neck <WH6677>, and wept <WH1058> <WH8799>; and Binyamin <WH1144> wept <WH1058> <WH8804> upon his neck <WH6677>.
Moreover he kissed <WH5401> <WH8762> all his brethren <WH251>, and wept <WH1058> <WH8799> upon them: and after <WH310> that his brethren <WH251> talked <WH1696> <WH8765> with him.

And the fame <WH6963> thereof was heard <WH8085> <WH8738> in Pharaoh's <WH6547> house <WH1004>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Yosef's <WH3130> brethren <WH251> are come <WH935> <WH8804>: and it pleased <WH3190> <WH5869> Pharaoh <WH6547> well <WH3190> <WH8799> <WH5869>, and <WH5869> his servants <WH5650>.

And Pharaoh <WH6547> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Yosef <WH3130>, Say <WH559> <WH8798> unto thy brethren <WH251>, This do <WH6213> <WH8798> ye; lade <WH2943> <WH8798> your beasts <WH1165>, and go <WH3212> <WH8798>, get <WH935> <WH8798> you unto the land <WH776> of Kanahan <WH3667>;

And take <WH3947> <WH8798> your father <WH1> and your households <WH1004>, and come <WH935> <WH8798> unto me: and I will give <WH5414> <WH8799> you the good <WH2898> of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, and ye shall eat <WH398> <WH8798> the fat <WH2459> of the land <WH776>.

Now thou art commanded <WH6680> <WH8795>, this do <WH6213> <WH8798> ye; take <WH3947> <WH8798> you wagons <WH5699> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> for your little ones <WH2945>, and for your wives <WH802>, and bring <WH5375> <WH8804> your father <WH1>, and come <WH935> <WH8804>.
Also <WH5869> regard <WH2347> <WH8799> not your stuff <WH3627>; for the good <WH2898> of all the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> is yours.

And the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> did <WH6213> <WH8799> so: and Yosef <WH3130> gave <WH5414> <WH8799> them wagons <WH5699>, according to the Mitzvah <WH6310> of Pharaoh <WH6547>, and gave <WH5414> <WH8799> them provision <WH6720> for the way <WH1870>.

To all of them he gave <WH5414> <WH8804> each man <WH376> changes <WH2487> of raiment <WH8071>; but to Binyamin <WH1144> he gave <WH5414> <WH8804> three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967> pieces of silver <WH3701>, and five <WH2568> changes <WH2487> of raiment <WH8071>.

And to his father <WH1> he sent <WH7971> <WH8804> after this <WH2063> manner; ten <WH6235> asses <WH860> laden <WH5375> <WH8802> with the good things <WH2898> of Egypt <WH4714>, and ten <WH6235> she asses <WH2543> laden <WH5375> <WH8802> with corn <WH1250> and bread <WH3899> and meat <WH4202> for his father <WH1> by the way <WH1870>.

So he sent <WH7971> his brethren <WH251> away <WH7971> <WH8762>, and they departed <WH3212> <WH8799>: and he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, See that ye fall not out <WH7264> <WH8799> by the way <WH1870>.
And they went up <WH5927> <WH8799> out of Egypt <WH4714>, and came <WH935> <WH8799> into the land <WH776> of Kanahan <WH3667> unto Ya`akov <WH3290> their father <WH1>,

And told <WH5046> <WH8686> him, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Yosef <WH3130> is yet alive <WH2416>, and he is governor <WH4910> <WH8802> over all the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>. And Ya`akov's heart <WH3820> fainted <WH6313> <WH8799>, for he believed <WH539> <WH8689> them not.

And they told <WH1696> <WH8762> him all the words <WH1697> of Yosef <WH3130>, which he had said <WH1696> <WH8765> unto them: and when he saw <WH7200> <WH8799> the wagons <WH5699> which Yosef <WH3130> had sent <WH7971> <WH8804> to carry <WH5375> <WH8800> him, the spirit <WH7307> of Ya`akov <WH3290> their father <WH1> revived <WH2421> <WH8799>:

And Yisra'EL <WH3478> said <WH559> <WH8799>, It is enough <WH7227>; Yosef <WH3130> my son <WH1121> is yet alive <WH2416>: I will go <WH3212> <WH8799> and see him <WH7200> <WH8799> before I die <WH4191> <WH8799>.
